properties.name: slice
properties.description: Custom client font based off of Chicago. Made by Falkreon.

properties.name: Neat
properties.description: Simple health and unit frames.

properties.name: Keyboard Wizard
properties.description: Visual keybind manager.

properties.name: Light Level Overlay Reloaded
properties.description: Smol light-level overlay if you aren't using Dynamic Surroundings.

properties.name: Sampler
properties.description: ***Admin/diagnostic tool. Leave off unless asked to help test performance issues.

properties.name: Client Tweaks
properties.description: Various client related fixes and tweaks, all in a handy menu.

properties.name: OpenEye
properties.description: Automatically collects and submits crash reports. Enable if asked or wish to help sort issues with the pack.

properties.name: LagGoggles
properties.description: ***Admin/diagnostic tool. Leave off unless asked to help test performance issues.

properties.name: Fancy Block Particles
properties.description: Caution: Resource heavy. Adds some flair to particle effects and animations. Highly configurable, costs fps. (Defaults set to be less intrusive.)

properties.name: JourneyMap
properties.description: Mod-compatible mini-map.

properties.name: Chunk Animator
properties.description: Configurable chunk pop-in animator.

properties.name: Just Enough HarvestCraft (JEHC)
properties.description: JEI Integration for Pam's HarvestCraft.

properties.name: JEI Bees
properties.description: JEI Integration for Forestry/Gendustry Bees.

properties.name: MAGE
properties.description: Configurable graphics enhancements. Highly recomended.

properties.name: NoFov
properties.description: Removes dynamic FOV shifting due to ingame effects.

properties.name: Smooth Font
properties.description: It smoothes fonts.

properties.name: Mouse Tweaks
properties.description: Add extra mouse gestures for inventories and crafting grids.

properties.name: Better Foliage
properties.description: Improves the fauna in the world. Very heavy, but very pretty. (Sane defaults set.)

properties.name: Durability Show
properties.description: Toggle-able item/tool/armor durability HUD. Duplicates with RPG-HUD.

properties.name: Vise
properties.description: More granular control over UI/HUD elements.

properties.name: RPG-Hud
properties.description: Highly configurable HUD - heavier alt to Neat. (Configured for compatibility with other mods.)

properties.name: Just Enough Resources (JER)
properties.description: JEI Integration that gives drop-rates for mobs, dungeonloot, etc.

properties.name: MineMenu
properties.description: Radial menu that can be used for command/keyboard shortcuts. Not selected by default because random keybinds cannot be added to radial menu.

properties.name: ItemZoom
properties.description: Check this if you like to get a closer look at item textures.

properties.name: Item Scroller
properties.description: Alternative to MouseTweaks.

properties.name: Xaero's Minimap
properties.description: Lightweight alternative to JourneyMap.

properties.name: Thaumic JEI
properties.description: JEI Integration for Thaumcraft.

properties.name: Unity
properties.description: Multi-mod compatible resource pack. Very nice, but does have some broken textures here and there.

properties.name: Dynamic Surroundings
properties.description: Caution: Resource heavy. Quite nice, has a lot of configurable features that add immersive sound/visual effects. Includes light-level overlay. (Defaults set to remove some sounds and generally be better.)

properties.name: Faster Ladder Climbing
properties.description: Helps you control ladder climb speed and allows you to go a bit faster.
